title: Make sure SKPaint.GetGlyphWidths returns widths for all characters
body:
**Description of Change**

Make sure SKPaint.GetGlyphWidths returns widths for all characters. And all related functions which may also have similar issues.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1093

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

All members now correctly process all characters.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
